projects.title: The Art of Lego
projects.description: A React application that helps the user add the Lego sets in their list. Also, it is possible to find a Lego Set with the number on the box or by name.

projects.title: Frank Memorial Web Page
projects.description: Created memorial webpage for a 65'' vertical touch screen with interactive gallery system allowing visitors to zoom in on photos and send them to designated email addresses. It was display at the Bini Bash 2023.
